Modul wbh.wbh_projekt_privatebuchhaltung
Package wbh.wbh_projekt_privatebuchhaltung.models.userProfile

Klasse Transaction

java.lang.Object
wbh.wbh_projekt_privatebuchhaltung.models.userProfile.Transaction
Bekannte direkte Unterklassen:
Expense, Income
public abstract class Transaction extends Object
Represents a financial transaction. This is an abstract base class for different transaction types like income and expenses.

  • Konstruktordetails

    • Transaction

      protected Transaction(double value, TransactionCategory category, BankAccount bankAccount, Date date, String description)
      Instantiates a new Transaction without an ID.
      Parameter:
      value - the transaction amount
      category - the transaction category
      bankAccount - the associated bank account
      date - the transaction date
      description - the transaction description

    • Transaction

      protected Transaction(int id, double value, TransactionCategory category, BankAccount bankAccount, Date date, String description)
      Instantiates a new Transaction with an ID.
      Parameter:
      id - the transaction ID
      value - the transaction amount
      category - the transaction category
      bankAccount - the associated bank account
      date - the transaction date
      description - the transaction description
